file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '1.0.0'
  title: 'CowDogTing'
  description: 'API 명세'
servers:
  # Added by API Auto Mocking Plugin
  - description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
    url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/ddaynew365/CowDogTing/1.0.0
  - description : API 명세
    url: http://localhost:4000/
paths:
  /api/core/userInfo:
    post:
      summary: 유저 정보 변경
      requestBody:
        description: 아이디, 지역, 나이, 정보
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                id:
                  type: string
                location:
                  type: string
                age:
                  type: number
                info:
                  type: string
            example:
              {
                id: "newID",
                location: "수원",
                age: 14,
                info: "안녕"
              }
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 유저 정보 변경 확인
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
    get:
      summary: 유저 정보 획득
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 유저 정보
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  image:
                    type: number
                  location:
                    type: string
                  sex: 
                    type: string
                  age: 
                    type: number
                  info: 
                    type: string
              example:
                id: "yj"
                image: 33
                location: "우만동"
                sex: "male"
                age: 25
                info: "안녕하세요"
        
  /api/core/image:
    get:
      summary: 이미지 불러오기
      parameters:
        - name: imageID
          in: query
          required: true
          description: 이미지 아이디
          schema:
            type: number
          example:
            23843900384290394
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 이미지 파일
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  image:
                    type: string
  
  /api/core/joinChatInfo:
    get:
      summary: 참여 채팅방 정보 가져오기 
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 참여 채팅방 정보
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    chatRoomID:
                      type: number
                    notReadNum:
                      type: number
              example:
                [
                  {
                    chatRoomID: 1,
                    notReadNum: 3
                  },
                  {
                    chatRoomID: 2,
                    notReadNum: 2
                  },
                ]
  /api/core/profile:
    get:
      summary: 소개 프로필 가져오기
      parameters:
      - name: person
        in: query
        description: 인원 수
        required: true
        schema:
          type: number
        example:
          1
      - name: index
        in: query
        description: 디비 번호
        required: true
        schema:
          type: number
        example:
          1
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 소개 프로필 데이터
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                    image:
                      type: number
                    location:
                      type: string
                    sex:
                      type: string
                    age:
                      type: number
                    info:
                      type: string
                example:
                  [
                    {
                      id: "yj",
                      image: "Image",
                      location: "우만동",
                      sex: "female",
                      age: 25,
                      info: "안녕하세요",
                    },
                    {
                      id: "hansory",
                      image: "Image",
                      location: "영통동",
                      sex: "female",
                      age: 20,
                      info: "반가워요",
                    }
                  ]
  /api/core/request:
    get:
      summary: 요청 목록 가져오기     
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 요청 목록
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        from:
                          type: string
                        to:
                          type: string
                        info: 
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                            image:
                              type: string
                            location:
                              type: string
                            sex:
                              type: string
                            age:
                              type: number
                            info:
                              type: string
                        state:
                          type: string  
              example:
                [
                  {
                    from: "123",
                    to: "yj",
                    info: {
                      id: "yj",
                      image: "Image",
                      location: "우만동",
                      sex: "female",
                      age: 25,
                      info: "안녕하세요",
                    },
                    state: "대기중",
                  },
                  {
                    from: "yj",
                    to: "123",
                    info: {
                      id: "123",
                      image: "Image",
                      location: "우만동",
                      sex: "female",
                      age: 26,
                      info: "안녕하세요",
                      member: [],
                    },
                    state: "대기중",
                  },
                ]    
  /api/core/postRequest:
    post:
      summary: 신청하기 호출
      requestBody:
        description: 요청 신청
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                from:
                  oneOf:
                    - type: string 
                    - type: number
                to:
                  oneOf:
                    - type: string 
                    - type: number
            example: {
                from: "hs",
                to: "yj"
            }
      responses:
        200:
          description: 유저 정보 변경 확인
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/core/denyRequest:
    post:
      summary: 거절하기 호출
      requestBody:
        description: 요청 신청
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                from:
                  oneOf:
                    - type: string 
                    - type: number
                to:
                  oneOf:
                    - type: string 
                    - type: number
            example: {
                from: 2,
                to: 1
            }                    
      responses:
        200:
          description: 유저 정보 변경 확인
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true        
                
  /api/core/acceptRequest:
    post:
      summary: 수락하기 호출
      requestBody:
        description: 요청 신청
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                from:
                  oneOf:
                    - type: string 
                    - type: number
                to:
                  oneOf:
                    - type: string 
                    - type: number
            example: {
                from: "hs",
                to: "yj"
            }                    
      responses:
        200:
          description: 유저 정보 변경 확인
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
                
  /api/auth/register:
    post:
      summary: 회원가입
      parameters:
        - name: userInfo
          in: header
          required: true
          description: 유저 정보
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
                uid: 
                  type: string
                password:
                  type: string
                location:
                  type: string
                sex:
                  type: string
                age:
                  type: number
                info:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 회원가입 성공 여부
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/auth/login:
    post:
      summary: 로그인 버튼 클릭(유저 정보 받아오기)
      # requestBody:
      #   description: 아이디, 비밀번호
      #   required: true
      #   content:
      #     application/json:
      #       schema: 
      #         type: object
      #         properties:
      #           uid:
      #             type: string
      #           password:
      #             type: string
      parameters:
      - name: uid
        in: header
        required: true
        description: 유저 아이디
        schema:
          type: string
        example:
          "my_id"
      - name: password
        in: header
        required: true
        description: 유저 비밀번호
        schema:
          type: string
        example:
          "my_pw"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 유저 정보
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/auth/logout:
    get:
      summary: 로그아웃
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 로그아웃 확인
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/auth/id-validation:
    get:
      summary: 회원가입(아이디 중복 검사)
      parameters:
        - name: uid
          in: query
          required: true
          description: 유저 아이디
          schema:
            type: string
          example:
            "my_id"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 회원가입 아이디 중복 검사 확인
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/team/create:
    post:
      summary: 팀 생성
      parameters:
      - name: teamInfo
        in: header
        required: true
        description: 팀 정보
        schema:
          type: object
          properties:
            description:
              type: string
            location:
              type: string
            leader:
              type: string
            name:
              type: string
          example:
            {
              description: "설명",
              location: "우만동",
              name: "cowdog"
            }
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 팀 생성 여부
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/team/update:
    post:
      summary: 팀 정보 수정
      parameters:
      - name: teamInfo
        in: header
        description: 새로운 팀 정보
        required: true
        schema:
          type: object
          properties:
            originTeamName:
              type: string
            name:
              type: string
            description:
              type: string
            location:
              type: string
            leader:
              type: string
        example:
          {
            originTeamName: "boo",
            name: "cowdog",
            description: "안녕하세요",
            location: "대구",
            leader: "alice"
            
          }
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 팀 정보 수정 성공 여부
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true

  /api/team/invite:
    post:
      summary: 팀원 초대하기
      parameters:
      - name: inviteID
        in: header
        description: 초대하려는 유저 아이디
        required: true
        schema:
          type: object
          properties:
            teamName:
              type: string
            userId:
              type: string
        example:
          {
            teamName: "cowdog",
            userId: "ddatnew"
          }
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 초대 성공 여부
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: boolean
              example:
                true
  /api/team/info:
    get:
      summary: 팀 정보 가져오기
      parameters:
        - name: teamId
          in: query
          description: 팀 아이디
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
          example:
            "1"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 팀 정보
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: 
                type: object
                properties:
                  id: 
                    type: string
                  info: 
                    type: string
                  location: 
                    type: string
                  age: 
                    type: number
                  leader: 
                    type: string
                  sex: 
                    type: string
                  image: 
                    type: number
                  member:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id: 
                          type: string
                        image: 
                          type: string
                        location: 
                          type: string
                        age: 
                          type: number
                        sex: 
                          type:  string
                        info: 
                          type: string
              example:
                {
                  image: "asfdadsf",
                  id: "팀명",
                  info: "asdfsafd",
                  location: "우만동",
                  age: 23,
                  leader: false,
                  sex: "male",
                  member: [
                    {
                      id: "yj",
                      image: "Image",
                      location: "우만동",
                      age: 23,
                      sex: "male",
                      info: "안녕하세요",
                    },
                    {
                      id: "hansory",
                      image: "Image",
                      location: "우만동",
                      age: 23,
                      sex: "male",
                      info: "안녕하세요",
                    },
                  ],
                }                
  /api/chat/info:
    get:
      summary: 채팅방 정보 가져오기
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 채팅방 정보
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        chatRoomID:
                          type: number
                        member:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: string
                              image:
                                type: number
                              location:
                                type: string
                              sex:
                                type: string
                              age:
                                type: number
                              info:
                                type: string
              example:
                [
                  {
                    chatRoomID: 1,
                    member: [
                      {
                        id: "영진",
                        image: dummyImage,
                        location: "우as만동",
                        sex: "male",
                        age: 25,
                        info: "gggg",
                      },
                      {
                        id: "222",
                        image: dummyImage,
                        location: "우fasd만동",
                        sex: "male",
                        age: 25,
                        info: "fffff",
                      },
                      {
                        id: "123",
                        image: dummyImage,
                        location: "asdf우만동",
                        sex: "male",
                        age: 25,
                        info: "afsd",
                      },
                    ],
                    chatMessage: [
                      {
                        from: "123",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "yj",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "123",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "123",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "yj",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "123",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "영진",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                    ],
                  },
                  {
                    chatRoomID: 2,
                    member: [
                      {
                        id: "3영진3",
                        image: dummyImage,
                        location: "우as만동",
                        sex: "male",
                        age: 25,
                        info: "gggg",
                      },
                      {
                        id: "222",
                        image: dummyImage,
                        location: "우fasd만동",
                        sex: "male",
                        age: 25,
                        info: "fffff",
                      },
                      {
                        id: "123",
                        image: dummyImage,
                        location: "asdf우만동",
                        sex: "male",
                        age: 25,
                        info: "afsd",
                      },
                    ],
                    chatMessage: [
                      {
                        from: "123",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "123",
                        message: "ㅎㅇㅎㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                      {
                        from: "3영진3",
                        message: "ㅂㅇㅂㅇ",
                        read: true,
                        source: "image",
                      },
                    ],
                  },
                ]

  /api/chat/messages:
    get:
      summary: 채팅 내역 추가 가져오기
      parameters:
      - name: chatRoomID
        in: query
        description: 채팅방 정보
        required: true
        schema:
          type: number
        example:
          1
      - name: index
        in: query
        description: 몇번째 페이지
        required: true
        schema:
          type: number
        example:
          2
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 채팅 내역
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  chatMessage:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties: 
                        from:
                          type: string
                        message:
                          type: string
                        read:
                          type: boolean
                        source:
                          type: number
